title: Number of eSports games players worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Sport in the x axis and Number of players in millions in the y axis.
Sport League of Legends has the highest Number of players in millions and StarCraft II has the lowest Number of players in millions.
There is a difference of 97.6 between the maximum Sport League of Legends and minimum Sport StarCraft II.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sport in the x axis and Number of players in millions in the y axis.
Sport League of Legends has the highest Number of players in millions and StarCraft II has the lowest Number of players in millions.
The Number of players in millions of Sport StarCraft II is 41.67% smaller than the maximum value at League of Legends.
